entry.title: 調弓注意事項
entry.content:
一樣也是從死海文書中發現的...

Brace Height Range:
Long riser + Medium limb = 8 1/2 - 9 1/4"

String:
Hoyt does not recommend more than 50 or less than 10 twists in a string.

Tiller:
We recommend you begin with 0-1/8" positive tiller.
(Bottom measurement 0-1/8" less than top measurement.)
If you find your sight moving up as you are drawing, increase the bottom
limb poundage slightly, or decrease the top limb  poundage.
If the sight is moving down as you draw, make the opposite adjustments.
To adjust the tiller without affecting bow weight, adjust both the top and
the bottom weight/tiller adjustment bolts in equal but opposite directions.

entry.title: 小貓裝備一覽本
entry.content:
整理資料翻出來的...好久遠的紀錄啊...

Weapon:
Arrow:
       PC carbon arrow with curly vanes(light green)
     ->CT McKenney 210 with white vanes and beiter nock(transparent blue)
                          ->yellow vanes
     ->Easton A.C.E 620 with yellow vanes, pin nock(diamond blue)
                           ->white vanes, pin nock(white)
     ->Easton A.C.E 570
Recurve Bow:
       Samick wooden bow 24 lbs.
     ->Samick wooden bow 30 lbs.
     ->Yamaha Recurve bow 34 lbs.(silver)
     ->Sky 30 lbs.(black)
     ->Hoyt Recurve bow 38 lbs.(camouflage)
     ->Hoyt Matrix wiz Vector 40 lbs.(fade green)
                     ->M1 36 lbs.(68" to 70")
Armor:
Arm Guard:
       beiter arm guard(transparent purple)(cursed)
     ->beiter arm guard(transparent blue)
Tab:
       Angel Tab
     ->Angel Tab with Anchor Pad
Quiver:
Slings:
       wrist-binded sling(white)(superlong)
     ->wrist-binded sling(blue)
Chest Guard:
       Cartel chest-guard(black)
     ->Shibuya chest-guard(black)
Hat:
       Nike Hat(black)

entry.title: 好久沒射箭了
entry.content:
今天正要出門騎紫來的時候就開始下雨
無聊之餘翻出之前放在台北的弓箱
想說過兩天可以去傳說中的中正體育中心射一下箭

打開塵封的箱子...裡面的東西保存的還是很好啊XD
不過這些東西官方網站上早就找不到了
正式晉身為老骨董系列。

保養完，稍微拉了一下
整個背部肌肉完全退化了嘛
才拉兩下，擴背肌就哀號了　囧
看來在去之前要先練幾天拉弓才行。

在弓箱中翻到這個我遺忘已久的東西
--磁鐵箭座


當初說大運會比完要裝上去，
結果後來就忘了這回事。

這款磁鐵箭座是靠button和一顆螺絲固定在弓身上
但我少了這顆螺絲，過幾天有經過螺絲店問問看吧。
